game.name: Cooking Steak Dinner
game.description:
Chef Susie loves to try new and delicious recipes every day in her restaurant. Beef Wellington Steak is a recipe that she has to cook today for her beloved customers. This dish is seasoning, rich of texture and mouth-watering. We are sure that you will definitely try it in your kitchen in real after playing Cooking Steak Dinner game in your favorite browser. Help this little chef to cook the best dinner she has ever made for her customers and see how delicious it will look in the end.    

Tonight dinner is going to be special since steak is on the menu. However, we can see that chef Susie has some confusion how to complete the recipe in order to satisfy the taste urges of their customers. Give your helping hand to her and show that the job is pretty easy. Follow all the needful guidelines and instructions in order to achieve the goal of this free online kitchen game for girls successfully. Your positive efforts will surely help to create the most delicious meat dish her customers have ever tasted. 

In the first step of this brand new cooking game, find out the right ingredients and needed kitchen tools and equipment. Pay attention to the useful details to prepare the scrumptious beef steak. After cooking the recipe, prepare the sauce as well to make this dinner treat more delicious and unforgettable. All the best ladies! Play this one of the best fun cooking games today and have a blast in your device!
